properties.description: Bottoming torque
properties.reason: Axion Automotive suggests maintaining their standard safety factor of 1.30, which is currently applied to the DCS-1 model. This is based on the absence of reported issues from field trials or serial production quality assurance (for GMC and other clients with applications up to 3000Nm) concerning spring reliability.

properties.description: Operational Life length
properties.reason: The clutch assembly is engineered to achieve a 2.5 million km durability target under standard European long-haul mission profiles concerning fatigue. This durability can be committed for these specific conditions but may not be fully guaranteed for all other operational demands.

properties.description: SPEC-25
properties.reason: Awaiting American Hauler Inc. marking specifications. Compliant for Norse Trucks & Germanic Automotive.

properties.description: Marking method
properties.reason: The quotation includes ink marking for the clutch cover, while the release bearing is specified for laser marking.

properties.description: Compliance to noise emission standard
properties.reason: Axion Automotive cannot guarantee compliance with International Regulation No. 51.04, as this is a vehicle-level requirement influenced by numerous components that contribute to the vehicle's overall noise emissions.

1) 2.40 x Tmax: 10^5 cycles / 3 samples
2) 1.80 x Tmax: 5 x 10^5 cycles / 3 samples
3) (-250 Nm / 1.35 x Tmax: 5.5 x 10^6 cycles + -450 Nm / 1700 Nm: 2.5 x 10^6 cycles + -2400 Nm (for 550kW engine brake) / 1700 Nm: 1.5 x 10^6 cycles) / 3 samples = Total 9.5 x 10^6 cycles
